boat.name: Minnie
boat.full_description:
The Cape Cutter 19 is an interesting take on the 'pocket grp gaffer' epitomised by the Shrimper.  The large rig gives good performance in light airs and the boats seaworthiness has been been proven.

Minnie completed a UK circumnavigation between 2013 and 2018. Read about it on the Cape Cutter Association website. 

After a spell in Chichester Harbour, where she was briefly known as 'Thistle', Minnie returned to the East Coast at the end of 2021.
boat.construction_details: Solid GRP hull, balsa core decks
boat.short_description: Minnie has been largely 'based' on the East Coast although, as intended, she has been trailed all over the UK, completing a UK circumnavigation 2013-2018 (previous owners). A little tired 2022, but being tidied...
